name: End Seal™
description: End Seal™ provides a functional and comprehensive protective water barrier that prevents moisture absorption and fast water evaporation from cross cut ends on logs, sawn lumber and cross laminated timber (CLT). Sansin End Seal is UV resistant, water-repellent and low in VOC’s offering protection to cross cut ends on logs, sawn lumber and CLT wood. End Seal provides deep wood penetration ensuring wood stability and long term protection while also reduce warping, shrinking and checking. This breathable, environmentally-friendly formula repels water, offers strong adhesion and offers easy soap and water clean-up.
